sentences.en: As a result, Greenland, for the well - deserved, " Big Brother Islands globe. "
sentences.cn: 因此, 格陵兰岛当之无愧为 “ 寰球诸岛大哥大 ”.

sentences.en: Greenland depends thick ice before it can process at high sea level.
sentences.cn: 格陵兰岛全靠厚厚的冰层,才使它能高高地突起于海平面上.

sentences.en: Greenland in the Danish official language literally means " green land. "
sentences.cn: 格陵兰在它的官方语言丹麦语的字面意思为 “ 绿色的土地 ”.

sentences.en: Greenland is the most important natural factor in urban landscape.
sentences.cn: 绿地是城市这个人工景观中最重要的自然要素.

sentences.en: Greenland's topology has been shaped by the glaciers of the ice age.
sentences.cn: 格林兰岛的布局是在冰河时代的冰川作用下形成的.

sentences.en: He persuaded some people to go back with him to Greenland.
sentences.cn: 并说服一些人与他一起回到格陵兰岛.

sentences.en: Oliver Burkeman on Greenland and a London airport expansion.
sentences.cn: 奥利弗•布克曼详述格陵兰与伦敦机场扩建.

sentences.en: Regardless of which version of Santa Claus you believe in, however, there is only one thing you need to know – that Santa Claus lives in Greenland.
sentences.cn: 不过 无论你相信的是那一个版本的圣诞老人 你只需要知道一件事-圣诞老人居住在格陵兰。

sentences.en: That is more than the gross national product of Greenland.
sentences.cn: 这笔花销超过了格陵兰的年国民生产总值.

sentences.en: The brightest spot in the image is Greenland, covered in snowy white.
sentences.cn: 图像中最明亮的区域是被白雪覆盖的格林兰岛.

sentences.en: The ice covering Greenland is about hundreds of meters thick.
sentences.cn: 覆盖格陵兰岛的冰大约有几百米厚.

sentences.en: The impact of Greenland's deglaciation on the Arctic circulation.
sentences.cn: 格陵兰的冰川减退作用对北极环流的影响.

sentences.en: There are about 70 species of spiders in Greenland alone.
sentences.cn: (据悉),仅格陵兰岛上的蜘蛛就多达70种左右.

sentences.en: This is confirmed by temperature reconstructions of marine sediments and Greenland cores.
sentences.cn: 海底沉积物和格陵兰冰芯气温重建证实了这一点.

sentences.en: What do accumulation records of single ice cores in Greenland represent?
sentences.cn: 格林兰单冰核心累集记录说明什么?

sentences.en: Wiki: The lyrics are dedicated to the Faroe Islands and Greenland.
sentences.cn: 王菲的英文歌,但是只是对象是格陵兰和法罗群岛.

trans.tran_cn: 格陵兰（岛名，位于北美洲的东北部，属丹麦）
格林兰（位于北美洲东北部，世界第一大岛）
